title: jupyterlab-logging
description: Settings of the jupyterlab log plugin.

kinesisStreamName.title: Kinesis stream name
kinesisStreamName.description: This is the name of the Kinesis stream.

nameOfLogs.title: Name of the logs
nameOfLogs.description: This is the name of the logs that can be filtered in AWS Kinesis Data Firehose.

identityPoolId.title: The identity pool id
identityPoolId.description: This is the identity pool of AWS Cognito of the Kinesis stream.

ChangeCellsInViewEvent.title: Enable the active cell change event
ChangeCellsInViewEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the active cell change listener

OpenNotebookEvent.title: Enable the notebook switch event
OpenNotebookEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the current notebook change listener

FinishExecuteCellEvent.title: Enable the finishing cell execution event
FinishExecuteCellEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the finishing cell execution listener

CellInsertedEvent.title: Enable the cell insert event
CellInsertedEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the cell insert event listener

CellCutEvent.title: Enable the cell cut event
CellCutEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the cell cut event listener

CellCopyEvent.title: Enable the cell copy event
CellCopyEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the cell copy event listener

CellPasteEvent.title: Enable the cell paste event
CellPasteEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the cell paste event listener

RunAllEvent.title: Enable the cell run all event
RunAllEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the cell run all event listener

RunAndAdvanceEvent.title: Enable the cell run and advance event
RunAndAdvanceEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the cell run and advance event listener

CellTypeChangeEvent.title: Enable the cell type change event
CellTypeChangeEvent.description: This is the button to turn on or off the cell type change event listener
